Spamhurt-Speed.description: Millisecond interval that spamhurt will do damage

Enable-Direct-Messages.description: Should Direct messages be allowed on the server?

commands.name: /hurt
commands.description: Hurts someone for specified number of damage. requires auth

args.name: name
args.description: someones name (uses fuzzy search). can also use * to hurt all

args.name: damage
args.description: number to hurt. can use decimals. defaults to 1 if empty/invalid

commands.name: /spamhurt
commands.description: Hurts someone a specified number of damage for a specified amount of hits. requires auth

args.name: name
args.description: someones name (uses fuzzy search). can also use * to hurt all

args.name: damage
args.description: number to hurt. can use decimals. defaults to 1 if empty/invalid

args.name: hit amount
args.description: how many times to apply damage. defaults to 25 if empty/invalid

commands.name: /dm
commands.description: Send a Direct message to someone else. If nothing happens then it is disabled

args.name: message
args.description: whatever message you intend to send

commands.name: /middle
commands.exmaple: /middle this shows up on the screen

args.name: message
args.description: whatever message you intend to send (allows rich text)
